uws.service.wait

Class WaitObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • uws.service.wait.WaitObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, JobObserver

    public class WaitObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobObserver
    Job observer that unblock (here: notify) the given thread when a change of the execution phase is detected.
    Since:
    4.2
    Version:
    4.2 (10/2015)
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (ARI)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaitObserver(java.lang.Thread thread)
      Build a JobObserver which will wake up the given thread when the execution phase of watched jobs changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(UWSJob job, ExecutionPhase oldPhase, ExecutionPhase newPhase)
      Used when one of the observed jobs notifies its observers of a modification of its execution phase.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WaitObserver

        public WaitObserver(java.lang.Thread thread)
        Build a JobObserver which will wake up the given thread when the execution phase of watched jobs changes.
        Parameters:
        thread - Thread to notify.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(UWSJob job,
          ExecutionPhase oldPhase,
          ExecutionPhase newPhase)
            throws UWSException
        Description copied from interface: JobObserver
        Used when one of the observed jobs notifies its observers of a modification of its execution phase.
        Specified by:
        update in interface JobObserver
        Parameters:
        job - The observed jobs which notifies the observer.
        oldPhase - The job phase before its modification.
        newPhase - The job phase after its modification (the same value as UWSJob.getPhase()).
        Throws:
        UWSException - If there is an error during the call of this method.
